title: Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle
summaries: The Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle is a post-Plantera pet summon item which summons a Baby Grinch pet that follows the player around. When the player is far enough away, a red balloon will carry the Baby Grinch to catch up with the player. It is dropped by the Ice Queen during the Frost Moon event with a 0.95% ~ 1.67% (3.33% ~ 6.67%) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
